abstract: Dude, love the channel. YouTube recommended it to me and I may or may not have binge watched for 3 hours hahaha. Great edits man. Love the style, great personality, and awesome tips. Keep rocking it man!
I'm moving to Paris this Fall. Really enjoying your insights.

I have two places that will definitely surprise you: 
La Maison d’Isabelle (Prix du meilleur croissant d’Île-de-France 2018) at Metro Maubert-Mutualité, and it’s just 1€.
Arnaud Delmontel at Rue des Martyrs. 
Try them!!!
